section.45: The Book of Oaths (qasamah), Retaliation and Blood Money

hadiths.text: It was narrated from Tariq and Muharibi that a manh said:"O Messenger of Allah, these are Banu Tha'labah who killed so and so during the Jahiliyyah: avenger us! He raised his arms until the whiteness of his armpits could be seen and said: "No mother's sin can affect her child," twice. (Shaih)
